report.title: User experience for a record
report.description: Gives a summary of records of a species and taxon group by a user for a selected record. Used in the verification process to give feedback as to whether the recorder is likely to give an accurate ID for this record.
report.query: select 'species' as type, r.taxon_meaning_id as what_id, cttl.preferred_taxon as what, sum(1) as total_total, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'3 months'::interval then 1 else 0 end) as total_3months, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'1 year'::interval then 1 else 0 end) as total_1year, sum(case co.record_status when 'V' then 1 else 0 end) as v_total, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'3 months'::interval and co.record_status='V' then 1 else 0 end) as v_3months, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'1 year'::interval and co.record_status='V' then 1 else 0 end) as v_1year, sum(case co.record_status when 'R' then 1 else 0 end) as r_total, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'3 months'::interval and co.record_status='R' then 1 else 0 end) as r_3months, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'1 year'::interval and co.record_status='R' then 1 else 0 end) as r_1year from cache_occurrences_functional r join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=r.taxa_taxon_list_id left join cache_occurrences_functional co on co.taxon_meaning_id=r.taxon_meaning_id and co.created_by_id=r.created_by_id where r.id=#occurrence_id# group by r.taxon_meaning_id, cttl.preferred_taxon union select 'group', r.taxon_group_id as what_id, cttl.taxon_group as what, sum(1) as total_total, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'3 months'::interval then 1 else 0 end) as total_3months, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'1 year'::interval then 1 else 0 end) as total_1year, sum(case co.record_status when 'V' then 1 else 0 end) as v_total, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'3 months'::interval and co.record_status='V' then 1 else 0 end) as v_3months, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'1 year'::interval and co.record_status='V' then 1 else 0 end) as v_1year, sum(case co.record_status when 'R' then 1 else 0 end) as r_total, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'3 months'::interval and co.record_status='R' then 1 else 0 end) as r_3months, sum(case when now()-co.created_on<'1 year'::interval and co.record_status='R' then 1 else 0 end) as r_1year from cache_occurrences_functional r join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=r.taxa_taxon_list_id left join cache_occurrences_functional co on co.taxon_group_id=r.taxon_group_id and co.created_by_id=r.created_by_id #filters# where r.id=#occurrence_id# group by r.taxon_group_id, cttl.taxon_group

param.name: minimum_taxon_rank_sort_order
param.description: Use to limit group data to only species level identifications, for example
param.where: (co.id is null or co.taxon_rank_sort_order >= #minimum_taxon_rank_sort_order# or co.taxon_rank_sort_order is null)
